channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on r-econometrics

item.title: R(eal) Basics
item.description: This section should help you to get R and RStudio started on your computer understand the structure of the program prepare your workspace for an analysis [import data and get help] [manipulate data with the dplyr package] create graphics with the ggplot2 package. Recently, I have finished the first version of a below 30 pages introduction to R. It uses an exemplary workflow to explain some basics of the language and the application of the packages dplyr, ggplot2 and openxlsx.
